title: A discourse for the vindicating of Christianity from the charge of imposture Offer'd, by way of letter, to the consideration of the deists of the present age. By Humphrey Prideaux, D.D. and arch-deacon of Suffolk.
author: Prideaux, Humphrey, 1648-1724.
publisher: printed by J. H. for W. Rogers, at the Sun, over-against St. Dunstan's Church in Fleet-street,
